name: KosmoShooter
description: The plot will reveal the possibilities of the future, where in order to successfully complete training as a pilot of a combat starship, it is necessary to complete several difficult tasks with the help of a combat simulator, which special-purpose pilots face. The protagonist is a person who has served 4 years at the space academy, he has to pass the most important exam, after which his fate will be decided, namely, whether he will become a pilot or not, as well as what kind of pilot he will be. After successfully completing the simulation, which will be divided into 4 worlds, according to the number of warring factions, the Protagonist will be assigned a rank + rank. Getting the highest ranks will depend not only on the skill of the player, but also on certain conditions that can be met or not.
